CustomField.description:
If “Audit Date“ is null/not populated, “Due Date“ should also be null/empty.
If “Audit Date“ has a value && If “Date NCs Closed“ is null
Then “Due Date“ should be “Audit Date“ + 28.
If “Audit Date“ has a value && If “Date NCs Closed“ has a value
Then “Due Date“ should be “Date NCs Closed“ + 28.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If “Audit Date“ is null/not populated, “Due Date“ should also be null/empty. If “Audit Date“ has a value && If “Date NCs Closed“ is null Then “Due Date“ should be “Audit Date“ + 28. If “Audit Date“ has a value && If “Date NCs Closed“ has a value Then “Due Date“ should be “Date NCs Closed“ + 28.
CustomField.label: Due Date
